entities.name: master regulus
entities.description: Master Regulus is mentioned as a character who said that the Dark Lord required an elf and volunteered Kreacher for this task.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as a character who was chosen by Master Regulus to go to the Dark Lord.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the Dark Lord who required an elf and took Kreacher with him to a cave.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who repeated Voldemort's name in surprise.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who looked puzzled.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who looked puzzled.

relationships.description: Master Regulus volunteered Kreacher for the task given by the Dark Lord.
The Dark Lord took Kreacher with him to a cave beside the sea.
